hints.study: Select the study you are attending at NTNU
hints.country: Select the country you will be exchanging to
hints.university: Select the university you will attend
hints.studyYear: Select the study year for your exchange
hints.numSemesters: Select the number of semesters you will be on exchange
hints.courseYear: Enter the year you took the course
hints.courseCode: Enter the course code of the course you will take
hints.courseName: Enter the name of the course you will take
hints.replacedCourseCode: Enter the course code of the NTNU course you will replace
hints.replacedCourseName: Enter the name of the NTNU course you will replace
hints.institute: Enter the institute of the course at the university you will attend
hints.ETCSPoints: Enter the number of ETCS points the course provides (convert from the university's unit if necessary)

exchanges.info: On this page, you can explore the exchange experiences of previous students. You can see which universities they attended, which countries they visited, and which courses they took.
